statements: DELETE FROM qr_payments WHERE payment_id = 101 AND payment_status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM qr_payments WHERE qr_code = 'abc123' AND amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM qr_payments WHERE amount > 1000 AND payment_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM payment_history WHERE qr_code_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND payment_amount > 100;
DELETE FROM payment_history WHERE payment_id = 100 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM qr_codes WHERE id = 10 OR payment_amount = 50.00;
DELETE FROM FailedPayments WHERE failure_reason = 'Invalid QR Code';
